casebody.data:
First Department,

May, 1981

(May 5, 1981) Edward Shapiro et al., Respondents, v Herbert Baum et al., Appellants.

—r Order, and judgment (one paper), Supreme Court, New York County, entered on June 10, 1980, unanimously affirmed on the opinion of Helman, J., at Special Term. Respondents shall recover of appellants $75 costs and disbursements of this appeal. Concur — Kupferman, J. P., Sullivan, Ross, Carro and Markewich, JJ.
